name: Backrooms - Horror Escape
description:
Backrooms is a horror game where you have to get out of the backstage.

You have fallen through the matter of our world and found yourself in the backstage. The backstage is a cold and creepy place where there is nothing but stench, yellow walls and wet carpets.

You have to find a way out of this terrible place, there are a lot of moves and rooms in this place, something terrible is constantly happening and you are not alone there, a monster is waiting for you, our advice to you is not to look at it and try to escape the backrooms.

You will be chased, the lights are constantly flickering and strange noise from the lamps and the exit may always be in different places.


The game will make you scared, these rooms with yellow walls have a very strong effect on you, try to get out!
